title: Socializing and Leisure
description: Improve your English speaking skills with phrases often used in socializing and leisure activities. Focus on clear pronunciation and friendly intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of phrases typically used in social and leisure settings.
Aim for clear and natural pronunciation.
Keep your speech at a conversational and steady pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as needed to improve your pronunciation.
